amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that, rather than replacing all pre-Katrina public housing units, only the number of public housing units occupied pre-Katrina be replaced.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 110-53 to require that, instead of replacing all pre-Katrina public housing units, only the number of public housing units occupied pre-Katrina be replaced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggert amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 232 (Roll no. 165).
